HEADLINES.headline: Confirmation on Training Sought for Discount Points
HEADLINES.impact: A collective desire was expressed for proper training on managing discount points, which could potentially improve team efficiency.

HEADLINES.headline: New QC Vendor Agreement
HEADLINES.impact: Sean has signed off on the new QC vendor, QC Ally, which could enhance service capabilities.

HEADLINES.headline: Cornerstone Team Name Policy Discussion
HEADLINES.impact: Discussion around guidelines for team names and email usage, indicating stricter governance moving forward.

ISSUES LIST (IDS).issue_description: Concern over team name and email usage compliance.
ISSUES LIST (IDS).root_cause: Inconsistencies in current usage; lack of adherence to prior guidelines.
ISSUES LIST (IDS).impact_urgency: High; potential layoffs if guidelines are not followed.
ISSUES LIST (IDS).related_discussions: Discussion about the threshold volume for team name approvals.
ISSUES LIST (IDS).notes: Concern that people are not adhering to new policies, particularly regarding DBAs.

ISSUES LIST (IDS).issue_description: Increased severity of BBB complaint against an employee.
ISSUES LIST (IDS).root_cause: The employee was allegedly involved in a criminal investigation.
ISSUES LIST (IDS).impact_urgency: Critical; needs immediate resolution to prevent escalation.
ISSUES LIST (IDS).related_discussions: Discussion around potentially terminating the employee.
ISSUES LIST (IDS).notes: Escalate the severity to Sean as it isn't going away.

SOLVED ISSUES.solution_decided: The correct email was resent to the parties involved.
SOLVED ISSUES.success_criteria: Receive a firm response confirming the receipt and action on the email.
